role.label: Fixed Income Funds [Member]

role.documentation: Debt security issued by corporation not domiciled in United States of America (US).
role.label: Debt Security, Corporate, Non-US [Member]

role.documentation: Designated tax departments of governments entitled to levy and collect income taxes from the entity outside the entity's country of domicile.
role.label: Foreign Tax Authority [Member]

role.documentation: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.
role.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), before Tax

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for (1) transactions denominated in a currency other than the reporting enterprise's functional currency, (2) translating foreign currency financial statements that are incorporated into the financial statements of the reporting enterprise by consolidation, combination, or the equity method of accounting, and (3) remeasurement of the financial statements of a foreign reporting enterprise in a hyperinflationary economy.
role.label: Foreign Currency Transactions and Translations Policy [Policy Text Block]

role.documentation: Amount of foreign earnings repatriated from subsidiaries outside the country of domicile.
role.label: Foreign Earnings Repatriated

role.documentation: Contractual arrangement with a lender under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time, and under which borrowings outstanding may be either short-term or long-term, depending upon the particulars, outside the reporting entity's home country.
role.label: Foreign Line of Credit [Member]

role.documentation: Location of employer sponsoring plan, designed to provide retirement benefits, not determined as principal place of business. Includes, but is not limited to, defined benefit and defined contribution plans.
role.label: Foreign Plan [Member]

role.documentation: Contracts negotiated between two parties to purchase and sell a specific quantity of a financial instrument, foreign currency, or commodity at a price specified at origination of the contract, with delivery and settlement at a specified future date.
role.label: Forward Contracts [Member]

role.documentation: The net gain (loss) recognized in earnings during the reporting period representing the amount of the cash flow hedges' ineffectiveness.
role.label: Gain (Loss) on Cash Flow Hedge Ineffectiveness, Net
role.negatedTerseLabel: Net (gain) loss reclassified from OCI to other income (expense), net (ineffective portion)

role.documentation: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets, including but not limited to property plant and equipment, intangible assets and equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.
role.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets
role.negatedTerseLabel: Gain on sale of assets and investments

role.documentation: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of other assets.
role.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Other Assets

role.documentation: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.
role.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment

role.documentation: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.
role.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt

role.documentation: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.
role.label: Goodwill

role.documentation: Amount of increase in asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized resulting from a business combination.
role.label: Goodwill, Acquired During Period
role.verboseLabel: Business combinations, goodwill acquired during period

role.documentation: Total loss recognized during the period from the impairment of goodwill plus the loss recognized in the period resulting from the impairment of the carrying amount of intangible assets, other than goodwill.
role.label: Goodwill and Intangible Asset Impairment
role.negatedLabel: Goodwill and intangible asset impairment charge
role.terseLabel: Goodwill and intangible asset impairment charge

role.label: Goodwill and Intangible Assets Disclosure [Abstract]

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for goodwill. This accounting policy also may address how an entity assesses and measures impairment of goodwill, how reporting units are determined, how goodwill is allocated to such units, and how the fair values of the reporting units are determined.
role.label: Goodwill and Intangible Assets, Goodwill, Policy [Policy Text Block]

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for intangible assets. This accounting policy may address both intangible assets subject to amortization and those that are not. The following also may be disclosed: (1) a description of intangible assets (2) the estimated useful lives of those assets (3) the amortization method used (4) how the entity assesses and measures impairment of such assets (5) how future cash flows are estimated (6) how the fair values of such asset are determined.
role.label: Goodwill and Intangible Assets, Intangible Assets, Policy [Policy Text Block]

role.documentation: The entire disclosure for goodwill.
role.label: Goodwill Disclosure [Text Block]

role.documentation: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which increases (decreases) an asset representing future economic benefits from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.
role.label: Goodwill, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)

role.documentation: Amount before accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.
role.label: Goodwill, Gross

role.documentation: Amount of accumulated impairment loss for an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.
role.label: Goodwill, Impaired, Accumulated Impairment Loss
Goodwill, Impaired, Accumulated Impairment Loss [Abstract]

role.documentation: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.
role.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.
role.label: Goodwill [Line Items]

role.documentation: A roll forward is a reconciliation of a concept from the beginning of a period to the end of a period.
role.label: Goodwill [Roll Forward]

role.documentation: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.
role.label: Gross Profit

role.documentation: Information by nature of guarantee.
role.label: Guarantor Obligations, Nature [Axis]

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.
role.label: Guarantor Obligations [Line Items]

role.documentation: Maximum potential amount of future payments (undiscounted) the guarantor could be required to make under the guarantee or each group of similar guarantees before reduction for potential recoveries under recourse or collateralization provisions.
role.label: Guarantor Obligations, Maximum Exposure, Undiscounted

role.documentation: Represents a description of the nature of the guarantee or each group of similar guarantees.
role.label: Guarantor Obligations, Nature [Domain]

role.documentation: Information by designation of purpose of derivative instrument.
role.label: Hedging Designation [Axis]

role.documentation: Designation of purpose of derivative instrument.
role.label: Hedging Designation [Domain]

role.documentation: Nature or intent of a hedge.
role.label: Hedging Relationship [Domain]

role.documentation: Designated tax department of the government of United Kingdom.
role.label: Her Majesty's Revenue and Customs (HMRC) [Member]

role.documentation: Amount of impairment loss resulting from write-down of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit to fair value.
role.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Indefinite-lived (Excluding Goodwill)

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for recognizing and measuring the impairment of long-lived assets. An entity also may disclose its accounting policy for long-lived assets to be sold. This policy excludes goodwill and intangible assets.
role.label: Impairment or Disposal of Long-Lived Assets, Policy [Policy Text Block]

role.documentation: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the parent.
role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
role.terseLabel: Income from continuing operations attributable to Air Products

role.documentation: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the noncontrolling interest.
role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
role.terseLabel: Less: Net income attributable to noncontrolling interests of continuing operations
role.verboseLabel: Net Income Attributable to Noncontrolling Interests of Continuing Operations

role.documentation: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to domestic operations.
role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Domestic

role.documentation: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.
role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
role.terseLabel: Income from continuing operations before taxes
role.totalLabel: Income From Continuing Operations Before Taxes

role.documentation: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to foreign operations, which is defined as Income or Loss generated from operations located outside the entity's country of domicile.
role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Foreign
Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Equity Method Investments, Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest [Abstract]
role.terseLabel: Income from Continuing Operations before Taxes

role.documentation: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations including portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.
role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest

role.documentation: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.
role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Basic Share
role.verboseLabel: Income from continuing operations (in dollars per share)

role.documentation: The amount of net income (loss) derived from continuing operations during the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.
role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Diluted Share
role.verboseLabel: Income from continuing operations (in dollars per share)

role.documentation: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.
role.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
role.negatedTerseLabel: Loss from discontinued operations, net of tax
role.terseLabel: Income (loss) from discontinued operations, net of tax
role.totalLabel: Income (loss) from Discontinued Operations, net of tax
role.verboseLabel: Income (Loss) From Discontinued Operations, net of tax

role.documentation: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.
role.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
role.terseLabel: Net Income Attributable to Noncontrolling Interests of Discontinued Operations
role.verboseLabel: Less: Net income attributable to noncontrolling interests of discontinued operations

role.documentation: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the parent. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.
role.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent

role.documentation: Per basic share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.
role.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Basic Share
role.terseLabel: Income (Loss) from discontinued operations (in dollars per share)

role.documentation: Per diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.
role.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Diluted Share
role.verboseLabel: Income (Loss) from discontinued operations (in dollars per share)

role.documentation: This item represents the entity's proportionate share for the period of the net income (loss) of its investee (such as unconsolidated subsidiaries and joint ventures) to which the equity method of accounting is applied. This item includes income or expense related to stock-based compensation based on the investor's grant of stock to employees of an equity method investee.
role.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments

role.documentation: This element represents the undistributed income (or loss) of equity method investments, net of dividends or other distributions received from unconsolidated subsidiaries, certain corporate joint ventures, and certain noncontrolled corporations; such investments are accounted for under the equity method of accounting. This element excludes distributions that constitute a return of investment, which are classified as investing activities.
role.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments, Net of Dividends or Distributions
Income Statement [Abstract]

role.documentation: Information by name of disposal group.
role.label: Disposal Group Name [Axis]

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.
role.label: Income Statement, Balance Sheet and Additional Disclosures by Disposal Groups, Including Discontinued Operations [Line Items]
role.terseLabel: Income Statement, Balance Sheet and Additional Disclosures by Disposal Groups, Including Discontinued Operations [Line Items]

role.documentation: Disclosure of information about a disposal group. Includes, but is not limited to, a discontinued operation, disposal classified as held-for-sale or disposed of by means other than sale or disposal of an individually significant component.
role.label: Disposal Groups, Including Discontinued Operations [Table]

role.documentation: Information by location in the income statement.
role.label: Income Statement Location [Axis]

role.documentation: Location in the income statement.
role.label: Income Statement Location [Domain]

role.documentation: Information by tax jurisdiction.
role.label: Income Tax Authority [Axis]

role.documentation: Agency, division or body classification that levies income taxes, examines tax returns for compliance, or grants exemptions from or makes other decisions pertaining to income taxes.
role.label: Income Tax Authority [Domain]

role.documentation: Information by name of taxing authority.
role.label: Income Tax Authority, Name [Axis]

role.documentation: Named agency, division or body that levies income taxes, examines tax returns for compliance, or grants exemptions from or makes other decisions pertaining to income taxes.
role.label: Income Tax Authority, Name [Domain]
Income Tax Disclosure [Abstract]

role.documentation: The entire disclosure for income taxes. Disclosures may include net deferred tax liability or asset recognized in an enterprise's statement of financial position, net change during the year in the total valuation allowance, approximate tax effect of each type of temporary difference and carryforward that gives rise to a significant portion of deferred tax liabilities and deferred tax assets, utilization of a tax carryback, and tax uncertainties information.
role.label: Income Tax Disclosure [Text Block]

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.
role.label: Income Tax Examination [Line Items]

role.documentation: A summary of income tax examinations that an enterprise is currently subject to or that have been completed in the current period typically including a description of the examination, the jurisdiction conducting the examination, the tax year(s) under examination, the likelihood of an unfavorable settlement, the range of possible losses, the liability recorded, the Increase or Decrease in the liability from the prior period, and any penalties and interest that have been incurred or accrued.
role.label: Income Tax Examination [Table]

role.documentation: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.
role.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for income taxes, which may include its accounting policies for recognizing and measuring deferred tax assets and liabilities and related valuation allowances, recognizing investment tax credits, operating loss carryforwards, tax credit carryforwards, and other carryforwards, methodologies for determining its effective income tax rate and the characterization of interest and penalties in the financial statements.
role.label: Income Tax, Policy [Policy Text Block]

role.documentation: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to revisions of previously reported income tax expense (benefit).
role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Prior Year Income Taxes, Amount
role.negatedTerseLabel: Tax benefit related to changes in tax positions on business separation activities

role.documentation: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to repatriation of foreign earnings.
role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Repatriation of Foreign Earnings, Amount
role.terseLabel: Tax expense related to repatriation of foreign earnings

role.documentation: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.
role.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
role.terseLabel: Cash paid for taxes (net of cash refunds)

role.documentation: Carrying amount due after one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from tax authorities as of the balance sheet date representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes.
role.label: Income Taxes Receivable, Noncurrent

role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to vendors for goods and services received and the amount of obligations and expenses incurred but not paid.
role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities

role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services.
role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable

role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in the asset reflecting the cost incurred on uncompleted contracts in excess of related billings.
role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Cost in Excess of Billing on Uncompleted Contract
role.negatedTerseLabel: Contracts in progress, less progress billings

role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate value of all inventory held by the reporting entity, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.
role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Inventories

role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from lessees arising from lease agreements.
role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Leasing Receivables
Increase (Decrease) in Operating Capital [Abstract]
role.verboseLabel: Working capital changes that provided (used) cash, excluding effects of acquisitions and divestitures:

role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets after deduction of operating liabilities classified as other.
role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets and Liabilities, Net

role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in receivables classified as other.
role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Receivables

role.documentation: A roll forward is a reconciliation of a concept from the beginning of a period to the end of a period.
role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Stockholders' Equity [Roll Forward]

role.documentation: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of share based payment arrangements using the treasury stock method.
role.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Share-based Payment Arrangements
role.terseLabel: Employee stock option and other award plans

role.documentation: Information by type or class of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit.
role.label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets [Axis]

role.documentation: Amount of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit.
role.label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)

role.documentation: The major class of indefinite-lived intangible asset (for example, trade names, etc. but not all-inclusive), excluding goodwill. A major class is composed of intangible assets that can be grouped together because they are similar, either by their nature or by their use in the operations of the company.
role.label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets, Major Class Name [Domain]
role.terseLabel: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets, Major Class Name [Domain]

role.documentation: The entire disclosure for all or part of the information related to intangible assets.
role.label: Intangible Assets Disclosure [Text Block]

role.documentation: Amount before accumulated amortization of intangible assets, excluding goodwill.
role.label: Intangible Assets, Gross (Excluding Goodwill)

role.documentation: Sum of the carrying amounts of all intangible assets, excluding goodwill, as of the balance sheet date, net of accumulated amortization and impairment charges.
role.label: Intangible Assets, Net (Excluding Goodwill)

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for interest capitalization.
role.label: Interest Capitalization, Policy [Policy Text Block]

role.documentation: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.
role.label: Interest Expense

role.documentation: Primary financial statement caption encompassing interest expense.
role.label: Interest Expense [Member]

role.documentation: Amount of interest income earned from interest bearing assets classified as other.
role.label: Interest Income, Other

role.documentation: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.
role.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
role.terseLabel: Cash paid for interest, net of amounts capitalized

role.documentation: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of [accrued] interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred and is unpaid. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).
role.label: Interest Payable, Current

role.documentation: Derivative instrument whose primary underlying risk is tied to the right to receive or pay a sum of money at a given interest rate.
role.label: Interest Rate Contract [Member]

role.documentation: Forward based contracts in which two parties agree to swap periodic payments that are fixed at the outset of the swap contract with variable payments based on a market interest rate (index rate) over a specified period.
role.label: Interest Rate Swap [Member]

role.documentation: Designated tax department of the United States of America government entitled to levy and collect income taxes from the entity.
role.label: Internal Revenue Service (IRS) [Member]

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for costs incurred when both (1) the software is acquired, internally developed, or modified solely to meet the entity's internal needs, and (2) during the software's development or modification, no substantive plan exists or is being developed to market the software externally.
role.label: Internal Use Software, Policy [Policy Text Block]

role.documentation: Eliminating entries used in operating segment consolidation.
role.label: Intersegment Eliminations [Member]
Inventory Disclosure [Abstract]

role.documentation: The entire disclosure for inventory. Includes, but is not limited to, the basis of stating inventory, the method of determining inventory cost, the classes of inventory, and the nature of the cost elements included in inventory.
role.label: Inventory Disclosure [Text Block]

role.documentation: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of completed merchandise or goods expected to be sold within one year or operating cycle, if longer.
role.label: Inventory, Finished Goods, Gross

role.documentation: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies held for future sale or to be used in manufacturing, servicing or production process.
role.label: Inventory, Gross

role.documentation: Amount by which inventory stated at last-in first-out (LIFO) is less than (in excess of) inventory stated at other inventory cost methods.
role.label: Inventory, LIFO Reserve
role.negatedLabel: Less: Excess of FIFO cost over LIFO cost

role.documentation: Amount after valuation and LIFO reserves of inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.
role.label: Inventory, Net

role.documentation: Disclosure of inventory accounting policy for inventory classes, including, but not limited to, basis for determining inventory amounts, methods by which amounts are added and removed from inventory classes, loss recognition on impairment of inventories, and situations in which inventories are stated above cost.
role.label: Inventory, Policy [Policy Text Block]

role.documentation: Gross amount of unprocessed materials to be used in manufacturing or production process and supplies that will be consumed.
role.label: Inventory, Raw Materials and Supplies, Gross

role.documentation: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of merchandise or goods in the production process expected to be completed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.
role.label: Inventory, Work in Process, Gross

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for investments in financial assets, including marketable securities (debt and equity securities with readily determinable fair values), investments accounted for under the equity method and cost method, securities borrowed and loaned, and repurchase and resale agreements. For marketable securities, the disclosure may include the entity's accounting treatment for transfers between investment categories and how the fair values for such securities are determined. Also, for all investments, an entity may describe its policy for assessing, recognizing and measuring impairment of the investment.
role.label: Investment, Policy [Policy Text Block]

role.documentation: Amount of investment in equity method investee and investment in and advance to affiliate.
role.label: Investments in and Advance to Affiliates, Subsidiaries, Associates, and Joint Ventures
role.verboseLabel: Investment in net assets of and advances to equity affiliates

role.documentation: Fair value portion of investments in an entity not consolidated. Includes, but is not limited to, investments in an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, an entity in which the reporting entity shares control of the entity with another party or group, an entity which the company has significant influence, but does not have control and subsidiaries that are not required to be consolidated and are accounted for using the equity or cost method.
role.label: Investments in Affiliates, Subsidiaries, Associates, and Joint Ventures, Fair Value Disclosure

role.documentation: Part of earth's surface not covered by water.
role.label: Land [Member]
Leases [Abstract]

role.documentation: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.
role.label: Liabilities

role.documentation: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.
role.label: Liabilities and Equity
Liabilities and Equity [Abstract]

role.documentation: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.
role.label: Liabilities, Current
Liabilities, Current [Abstract]

role.documentation: Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.
role.label: Financial and Nonfinancial Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure

role.documentation: Amount of obligation due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.
role.label: Liabilities, Noncurrent

role.documentation: The noncurrent portion, due in greater than one year or one operating cycle, if longer, of liabilities resulting from the transfer of a business segment under contractual arrangement where the transferor maintains certain risks, obligations, or liabilities.
role.label: Liabilities of Business Transferred under Contractual Arrangement, Noncurrent

role.documentation: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Current

role.documentation: Amount recognized for uncertainty in income taxes classified as noncurrent.
role.label: Liability for Uncertainty in Income Taxes, Noncurrent
role.terseLabel: Contingencies related to uncertain tax positions

role.documentation: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current and noncurrent portions of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.
role.label: Long-term Line of Credit
role.verboseLabel: Credit facility, amount borrowed and outstanding

role.documentation: Maximum borrowing capacity under the credit facility without consideration of any current restrictions on the amount that could be borrowed or the amounts currently outstanding under the facility.
role.label: Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Borrowing Capacity

role.documentation: Borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.
role.label: Loans Payable [Member]

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.
role.label: Long Lived Assets Held-for-sale [Line Items]

role.documentation: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.
role.label: Long-term Debt
role.terseLabel: Long-term debt, including current portion carrying value

role.documentation: Amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.
role.label: Long-term Debt and Capital Lease Obligations

role.documentation: Amount of long-term debt and capital leases due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
role.label: Long-term Debt and Capital Lease Obligations, Current
role.negatedTerseLabel: Less: Current portion of long-term debt

role.documentation: Amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligations including current maturities.
role.label: Long-term Debt and Capital Lease Obligations, Including Current Maturities

role.documentation: Principal amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Long-term Debt and Capital Lease Obligations, Maturities, Repayments of Principal after Year Five

role.documentation: Principal amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Long-term Debt and Capital Lease Obligations, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Year Five

role.documentation: Principal amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Long-term Debt and Capital Lease Obligations, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Year Four

role.documentation: Principal amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Long-term Debt and Capital Lease Obligations, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Year Three

role.documentation: Principal amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Long-term Debt and Capital Lease Obligations, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Year Two

role.documentation: Principal amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Long-term Debt and Capital Lease Obligations, Repayments of Principal in Next Twelve Months

role.documentation: The fair value amount of long-term debt whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission.
role.label: Long-term Debt, Fair Value
role.terseLabel: Long-term debt, including current portion fair value

role.documentation: Information by type of long-term debt.
role.label: Long-term Debt, Type [Axis]

role.documentation: Type of long-term debt arrangement, such as notes, line of credit, commercial paper, asset-based financing, project financing, letter of credit financing. These are debt arrangements that originally required repayment more than twelve months after issuance or greater than the normal operating cycle of the company, if longer.
role.label: Long-term Debt, Type [Domain]

role.documentation: Weighted average interest rate of long-term debt outstanding calculated at point in time.
role.label: Long-term Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate, at Point in Time

role.documentation: Information by type of existing condition, situation, or set of circumstances involving uncertainty as to possible loss to an enterprise that will ultimately be resolved when one or more future events occur or fail to occur.
role.label: Loss Contingency Nature [Axis]

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.
role.label: Loss Contingencies [Line Items]

role.documentation: Discloses the specific components (such as the nature, name, and date) of the loss contingency and gives an estimate of the possible loss or range of loss, or states that a reasonable estimate cannot be made. Excludes environmental contingencies, warranties and unconditional purchase obligations.
role.label: Loss Contingencies [Table]

role.documentation: The value (monetary amount) of the award the plaintiff seeks in the legal matter.
role.label: Loss Contingency, Damages Sought, Value

role.documentation: Reflects the estimated amount of loss from the specified contingency as of the balance sheet date.
role.label: Loss Contingency, Estimate of Possible Loss
role.terseLabel: Estimate of possible exposure from environment loss contingencies

role.documentation: The amount of loss pertaining to the specified contingency that was charged against earnings in the period, including the effects of revisions in previously reported estimates.
role.label: Loss Contingency, Loss in Period

role.documentation: An existing condition, situation, or set of circumstances involving uncertainty as to possible loss to an enterprise that will ultimately be resolved when one or more future events occur or fail to occur. Resolution of the uncertainty may confirm the incurrence of a loss or impairment of an asset or the incurrence of a liability.
role.label: Loss Contingency, Nature [Domain]
role.terseLabel: Site Loss Contingency, Nature of Contingency [Domain]

role.documentation: Tangible personal property used to produce goods and services, including, but is not limited to, tools, dies and molds, computer and office equipment.
role.label: Machinery and Equipment [Member]
role.terseLabel: Distribution and other machinery and equipment

role.documentation: Structure used in the manufacturing of goods.
role.label: Manufacturing Facility [Member]

role.documentation: Items used in reconciling reportable segments' amounts to consolidated amount. Excludes corporate-level activity.
role.label: Segment Reconciling Items [Member]

role.documentation: Maximum amount of time remaining before foreign currency exchange rate derivatives mature or expire, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents the reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.
role.label: Maximum Remaining Maturity of Foreign Currency Derivatives
role.terseLabel: Maximum remaining maturity of foreign currency derivatives

role.documentation: Debt instruments with maturities ranging from five to ten years.
role.label: Medium-term Notes [Member]

role.documentation: Designated tax department of the government of France.
role.label: Ministry of the Economy, Finance and Industry, France [Member]

role.documentation: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which is directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (that is, noncontrolling interest, previously referred to as minority interest).
role.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest

role.documentation: Decrease in noncontrolling interest balance from payment of dividends or other distributions by the non-wholly owned subsidiary or partially owned entity, included in the consolidation of the parent entity, to the noncontrolling interest holders.
role.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Distributions to Noncontrolling Interest Holders

role.documentation: The equity interest of noncontrolling shareholders, partners or other equity holders in consolidated entity.
role.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Ownership Percentage by Noncontrolling Owners

role.documentation: The parent entity's interest in net assets of the subsidiary, expressed as a percentage.
role.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Ownership Percentage by Parent

role.documentation: A roll forward is a reconciliation of a concept from the beginning of a period to the end of a period.
role.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Movement in Valuation Allowances and Reserves [Roll Forward]
role.terseLabel: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Movement in Valuation Allowances and Reserves [Roll Forward]

role.documentation: Increase (decrease) in cash associated with the entity's discontinued operations.
role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Discontinued Operations
Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Discontinued Operations [Abstract]

role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.
role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations
Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations [Abstract]

role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.
role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations
Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations [Abstract]

role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.
role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations [Abstract]

role.documentation: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.
role.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
role.negatedLabel: Net income (loss) attributable to Air Products
role.terseLabel: Net income attributable to Air Products
role.totalLabel: Net Income Attributable to Air Products

role.documentation: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.
role.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
role.verboseLabel: Net Income Attributable to Noncontrolling Interests

role.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest [Abstract]
role.terseLabel: Net Income Attributable to Air Products

role.documentation: Amount after income tax of income (loss) including the portion attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest. Excludes the portion attributable to redeemable noncontrolling interest recognized as temporary equity.
role.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Nonredeemable Noncontrolling Interest

role.documentation: Hedges of a net investment in a foreign operation.
role.label: Net Investment Hedging [Member]
New Accounting Pronouncements and Changes in Accounting Principles [Abstract]

role.documentation: The entire disclosure of changes in accounting principles, including adoption of new accounting pronouncements, that describes the new methods, amount and effects on financial statement line items.
role.label: New Accounting Pronouncements and Changes in Accounting Principles [Text Block]

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.
role.label: New Accounting Pronouncements or Change in Accounting Principle [Line Items]
role.terseLabel: New Accounting Pronouncements or Change in Accounting Principle [Line Items]

role.documentation: Summarization of the changes in an accounting principle or a new accounting pronouncement, including the line items affected by the change and the financial effects of the change on those particular line items.
role.label: New Accounting Pronouncements or Change in Accounting Principle [Table]
role.terseLabel: New Accounting Pronouncements or Change in Accounting Principle [Table]

role.documentation: The amount of investments that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.
role.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Investments Acquired

role.documentation: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from subsidiary issuance of equity interests to noncontrolling interest holders.
role.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Subsidiary Equity Issuance
role.verboseLabel: Equity issued related to asset acquisition

role.documentation: This element represents that portion of equity (net assets) in a subsidiary not attributable, directly or indirectly, to the parent. A noncontrolling interest is sometimes called a minority interest.
role.label: Noncontrolling Interest [Member]

role.documentation: Derivative instrument not designated as hedging instrument under Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP).
role.label: Not Designated as Hedging Instrument [Member]

role.documentation: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), payable to related parties, which are due after one year (or one business cycle).
role.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties, Noncurrent

role.documentation: A written promise to pay a note to a bank.
role.label: Notes Payable to Banks [Member]

role.documentation: Nominal or face amount used to calculate payments on a nonderivative instrument.
role.label: Notional Amount of Nonderivative Instruments
role.terseLabel: Notional amount included in designated foreign currency denominated debt

role.documentation: The number of businesses acquired by the entity during the period.
role.label: Number of Businesses Acquired
role.terseLabel: Number of business combinations completed in period

role.documentation: Tax year that remains open to examination under enacted tax laws, in CCYY format.
role.label: Open Tax Year
role.terseLabel: Open tax year subject to examination

role.documentation: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.
role.label: Operating Income (Loss)

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.
role.label: Operating Leased Assets [Line Items]

role.documentation: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Fiscal Year Maturity [Abstract]

role.documentation: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months

role.documentation: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Five Years

role.documentation: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years

role.documentation: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years

role.documentation: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years

role.documentation: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due Thereafter

role.documentation: Future minimum rental payments in aggregate as of the balance sheet date under operating leases.
role.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable
Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable [Abstract]
role.terseLabel: Minimum Operating Lease Payments Expected to be Collected

role.documentation: Future rental payments receivable within one year of the balance sheet date under an operating lease.
role.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Current

role.documentation: Future rental payments receivable within the fifth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.
role.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Five Years

role.documentation: Future rental payments receivable within the fourth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.
role.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Four Years

role.documentation: Future rental payments receivable within the third year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.
role.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Three Years

role.documentation: Future rental payments receivable within the second year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.
role.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Two Years

role.documentation: Future minimum lease payments receivable under operating leases for periods greater than five years following the balance sheet date.
role.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Thereafter

role.documentation: Rental expense for the reporting period incurred under operating leases, including minimum and any contingent rent expense, net of related sublease income.

role.documentation: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.
role.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards [Line Items]

role.documentation: Schedule reflecting pertinent information, such as tax authority, amounts, and expiration dates, of net operating loss carryforwards, including an assessment of the likelihood of utilization.
role.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards [Table]

role.documentation: Identifies components of an entity that engage in business activities from which they may earn revenue and incur expenses, including transactions with other components of the same entity.
role.label: Operating Segments [Member]

role.documentation: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.
role.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
role.verboseLabel: Write-down of long-lived assets associated with cost reduction actions

role.documentation: Amount of current assets classified as other.
role.label: Other Assets, Current

role.documentation: Amount of other miscellaneous assets expected to be realized or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.
role.label: Other Assets, Miscellaneous, Current

role.documentation: Amount of other miscellaneous assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.
role.label: Other Assets, Miscellaneous, Noncurrent

role.documentation: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.
role.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent

role.documentation: Amount, before tax, of cost (credit) of benefit change attributable to participants' prior service from plan amendment or plan initiation of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).
role.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, Prior Service Cost (Credit), before Tax
role.terseLabel: Prior service cost arising during the period

role.documentation: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Gain (Loss) Arising During Period, Net of Tax

role.documentation: Amount of tax expense (benefit), before reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss) Arising During Period, Tax

role.documentation: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for prior service cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.

role.documentation: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Reclassifications, Net of Tax

role.documentation: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for translation gain (loss) realized upon the sale or liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity and foreign currency hedges that are designated and qualified as hedging instruments for hedges of the foreign currency exposure of a net investment in a foreign operation.
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, Realized upon Sale or Liquidation, Net of Tax

role.documentation: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax [Abstract]
role.terseLabel: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), net of tax:

role.documentation: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interests.
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
role.terseLabel: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interests

role.documentation: Amount, after tax, before reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).
role.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, before Reclassification Adjustment, after Tax
role.negatedLabel: Pension and postretirement benefits, net of tax

role.documentation: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan.
role.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Reclassification Adjustment, before Tax

role.documentation: Amount, before reclassification adjustment, of tax (expense) benefit for (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan.
role.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, before Reclassification Adjustment, Tax
role.negatedLabel: Tax effect on pension and postretirement benefits

role.documentation: Amount, before tax, of gain (loss) for (increase) decrease in value of benefit obligation for change in actuarial assumptions and increase (decrease) in value of plan assets from experience different from that assumed of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Gain (Loss) Arising During Period, before Tax
role.negatedLabel: Net actuarial gain arising during the period

role.documentation: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income of accumulated gain (loss) realized from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's deferred hedging gain (loss).
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI on Derivatives, Net of Tax

role.documentation: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income of accumulated gain (loss) realized from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's deferred hedging gain (loss).
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI on Derivatives, Tax
role.negatedLabel: Tax effect on derivatives reclassification adjustments

role.documentation: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for gain (loss) of defined benefit plan.
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Gain (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, before Tax

role.documentation: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for net periodic benefit cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.
role.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, after Tax
role.verboseLabel: Pension and postretirement benefits, net of tax

role.documentation: Amount of tax (expense) benefit for reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss of defined benefit plan.
role.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, Tax
role.negatedLabel: Tax effect on pension and postretirement benefits reclassification adjustments

role.documentation: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, Net of Tax
role.terseLabel: Net gain (loss) on derivatives, net of tax
role.verboseLabel: Net gain (loss) recognized in OCI (effective portion)

role.documentation: Amount of tax expense (benefit), before reclassification adjustments, related to increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, Tax
role.verboseLabel: Tax effect on net gain (loss) on derivatives

role.documentation: Derivative instrument whose primary underlying risk is classified as other.
role.label: Other Contract [Member]

role.documentation: Intangible assets classified as other.
role.label: Other Intangible Assets [Member]

role.documentation: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
role.label: Other Liabilities, Current

role.documentation: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
role.label: Other Liabilities, Noncurrent

role.documentation: Primary financial statement caption encompassing other noncurrent assets.
role.label: Other Noncurrent Assets [Member]

role.documentation: Primary financial statement caption encompassing other noncurrent liabilities.
role.label: Other Noncurrent Liabilities [Member]

role.documentation: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.
role.label: Other Nonoperating Expense

role.documentation: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.
role.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)

role.documentation: Primary financial statement caption encompassing other nonoperating income (expense).
role.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense) [Member]

role.documentation: Other cash or noncash adjustments to reconcile net income to cash provided by (used in) operating activities that are not separately disclosed in the statement of cash flows (for example,  cash received or cash paid during the current period for miscellaneous operating activities, net change during the reporting period in other assets or other liabilities).
role.label: Other Operating Activities, Cash Flow Statement

role.documentation: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.
role.label: Other Operating Income (Expense), Net

role.documentation: Plan designed to provide other postretirement benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, defined benefit and defined contribution plans. Excludes pension benefits.
role.label: Other Postretirement Benefits Plan [Member]

role.documentation: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit other postretirement plan, classified as noncurrent. Excludes pension plan.
role.label: Liability, Other Postretirement Defined Benefit Plan, Noncurrent

role.documentation: Amount due from parties in nontrade transactions, classified as other.
role.label: Other Receivables

role.documentation: Obligations not otherwise itemized or categorized in the footnotes to the financial statements that are expected to be paid after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer), from the balance sheet date.
role.label: Other Sundry Liabilities, Noncurrent

role.documentation: Portion of equity, or net assets, in the consolidated entity attributable, directly or indirectly, to the parent. Excludes noncontrolling interests.
role.label: Parent [Member]

role.documentation: Exclusive legal right granted by the government to the owner of the patented technology to exploit the technology for a period of time specified by law.
role.label: Patented Technology [Member]

role.documentation: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.
role.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities

role.documentation: Amount of cash payments made as the result of exit or disposal activities. Excludes payments associated with a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.
role.label: Payments for Restructuring

role.documentation: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.
role.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock

role.documentation: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

role.documentation: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of all investments (debt, security, other) during the period.

role.documentation: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

role.documentation: The entire disclosure for pension and other postretirement benefits.

role.documentation: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans, classified as current.

role.documentation: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans, classified as noncurrent.
role.label: Liability, Defined Benefit Plan, Noncurrent

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for pension and other postretirement benefit plans. This accounting policy may address (1) the types of plans sponsored by the entity, and the benefits provided by each plan (2) groups that participate in (or are covered by) each plan (3) how plan assets, liabilities and expenses are measured, including the use of any actuaries and (4) significant assumptions used by the entity to value plan assets and liabilities and how such assumptions are derived.
role.label: Pension and Other Postretirement Plans, Policy [Policy Text Block]

role.documentation: Plan designed to provide participant with pension benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, defined benefit and defined contribution plans. Excludes other postretirement benefits.
role.label: Pension Plan [Member]

role.documentation: The percentage of LIFO (last in first out) inventory to total inventory as of the balance sheet date if other than 100 percent.

role.documentation: An agreement (contract) that requires the guarantor to make payments to a guaranteed party based on another entity's failure to perform under an obligating agreement. This may include the issuance of a performance standby letter of credit which requires the guarantor to make payments if a specified party fails to perform under a nonfinancial contractual obligation.
role.label: Performance Guarantee [Member]

role.documentation: Defined benefit plan asset investment.
role.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Category [Domain]
role.terseLabel: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Category [Domain]

role.documentation: Measured at fair value for financial reporting purposes.
role.label: Portion at Fair Value Measurement [Member]

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for postemployment benefits. Postemployment benefits are benefits provided to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement, except for: a) benefits provided through a pension or postretirement benefit plan, b) individual deferred compensation arrangements, c) special or contractual termination benefits, and d) stock compensation plans.
role.label: Postemployment Benefit Plans, Policy [Policy Text Block]

role.documentation: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.
role.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
role.terseLabel: Perferred stock, par value (in dollars per share)

role.documentation: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.
role.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized

role.documentation: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.
role.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued

role.documentation: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.
role.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding

role.documentation: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
role.label: Prepaid Expense, Current

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for reclassifications that affects the comparability of the financial statements.
role.label: Reclassification, Policy [Policy Text Block]

role.documentation: The aggregate cash inflow comprised of the amount received from (a) employees to acquire the entity's shares under incentive awards, including stock option exercises and restricted stock arrangements, and (b) the excess tax benefit arising from such transactions.
role.label: Proceeds and Excess Tax Benefit from Share-based Compensation

role.documentation: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a portion of the company's business, for example a segment, division, branch or other business, during the period.
role.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses

role.documentation: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.
role.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt

role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.
role.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities

role.documentation: The net cash inflow or outflow for borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
role.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Short-term Debt
role.terseLabel: Net decrease in commercial paper and short-term borrowings

role.documentation: The cash inflow associated with the sale and maturity (principal being due) of other investments, prepayment and call (request of early payment) of other investments not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.
role.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Other Investments

role.documentation: Aggregate cash proceeds received from a combination of transactions that are classified as investing activities in which assets, which may include one or more investments, are sold to third-party buyers. This element can be used by entities to aggregate proceeds from all asset sales that are classified as investing activities.
role.label: Proceeds from Sales of Assets, Investing Activities
role.terseLabel: Proceeds from Sales of Assets, Investing Activities

role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow from exercise of stock options granted under share-based compensation arrangement.
role.label: Proceeds from Stock Options Exercised

role.documentation: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.
role.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Property, Plant and Equipment [Abstract]

role.documentation: Information by type of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.
role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Type [Axis]

role.documentation: The entire disclosure for long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Includes, but is not limited to, accounting policies and methodology, roll forwards, depreciation, depletion and amortization expense, including composite depreciation, accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization expense, useful lives and method used, income statement disclosures, assets held for sale and public utility disclosures.
role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment Disclosure [Text Block]

role.documentation: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.
role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.
role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment [Line Items]

role.documentation: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.
role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Includes, but is not limited to, basis of assets, depreciation and depletion methods used, including composite deprecation, estimated useful lives, capitalization policy, accounting treatment for costs incurred for repairs and maintenance, capitalized interest and the method it is calculated, disposals and impairments.
role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Policy [Policy Text Block]
