role.documentation: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from foreign currency translation.
role.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Foreign Currency Translation

role.documentation: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.
role.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
role.terseLabel: Additions for tax positions of prior years

role.documentation: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.
role.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations

role.documentation: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.
role.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
role.terseLabel: Unrecognized tax benefits that would impact effective tax rate

role.documentation: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due within Five Years

role.documentation: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due in Next Twelve Months

role.documentation: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due within Four Years

role.documentation: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due within Two Years

role.documentation: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due within Three Years

role.documentation: Amount of the unrecorded obligation to transfer funds in the future for fixed or minimum amounts or quantities of goods or services at fixed or minimum prices (for example, as in take-or-pay contracts or throughput contracts).
role.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation

role.documentation: Pertinent information about unrecorded unconditional purchase arrangements to acquire goods or services, by category of goods or services. arrangements to acquire goods or services, by category of goods or services.
role.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation by Category of Item Purchased [Axis]
role.terseLabel: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation by Category of Item Purchased [Axis]

role.documentation: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
role.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due after Five Years

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.
role.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation [Line Items]

role.documentation: Describes each unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation arrangement to purchase goods and services that extend over multiple periods, any assets pledged to secure payment, and the fixed or determinable amount of payments due in each of the next five years and thereafter.
role.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation [Table]

role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of unconditional purchase obligations that are not recognized as a liability on the balance sheet, including the nature and significant terms of an unconditional purchase obligation; the amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the obligation as of the date of the latest balance sheet presented in the aggregate and, if determinable, for each of the five succeeding fiscal years; the nature of any variable components of the obligation; the amount purchased under the obligation (for example, the take-or-pay or throughput contract) for the reporting period; and may include the amount of imputed interest necessary to reduce the obligation to present value.
role.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligations Disclosure [Table Text Block]
role.terseLabel: Schedule of Unconditional Purchase Obligations Disclosure

role.documentation: Debt obligation not collateralized by pledge of, mortgage of or other lien on the entity's assets.
role.label: Unsecured Debt [Member]

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for the use of estimates in the preparation of financial statements in conformity with generally accepted accounting principles.
role.label: Use of Estimates, Policy [Policy Text Block]

role.documentation: Legal right to use or benefit from the use of natural resources or access. Examples include, but are not limited to, drilling rights, water rights, air rights, timber cutting rights and route authorities.
role.label: Use Rights [Member]

role.documentation: Information by type of deferred tax consequences attributable to deductible temporary differences.
role.label: Valuation Allowance by Deferred Tax Asset [Axis]
role.terseLabel: Valuation Allowance by Deferred Tax Asset [Axis]

role.documentation: Valuation allowance of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary difference and carryforward.
role.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset [Member]

role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from adjustment.
role.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Increase (Decrease) Adjustment

role.documentation: Amount of valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.
role.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Amount

role.documentation: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to cost and expense.
role.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Additions, Charge to Cost and Expense

role.documentation: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to accounts other than cost and expense.
role.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Additions, Charge to Other Account

role.documentation: Valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.
role.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves [Domain]
role.terseLabel: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves [Domain]

role.documentation: Information by valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.
role.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves Type [Axis]
role.terseLabel: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves Type [Axis]

role.documentation: Equipment used primarily for road transportation.
role.label: Vehicles [Member]

role.documentation: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.
role.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
role.verboseLabel: Weighted Average Common Shares - Diluted (in millions)

role.documentation: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.
role.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
role.verboseLabel: Weighted Average Common Shares - Basic (in millions)
